name: Portgas.D.Ace
text:
Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
On Play: Draw two cards, then return two cards from your hand to the top or bottom of the deck in the order of your choice.

effect.text: (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
Draw two cards, then return two cards from your hand to the top or bottom of the deck in the order of your choice.
